#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include<math.h>
int main() 
{
	int i,t, count_even=0, count_odd=0;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	int num[t];
	for(i=0; i<t; i++)
	{
		scanf("%d", &num[i]);
		if(num[i]%2==0)
			count_even++;
		else 
			count_odd++;
	}
	printf("%d", abs(count_even-count_odd));
	return 0;
}
